body.name: Freeman Dual Marble Peel-Off Facial Mask Bundle, French Pink Clay & Blue Tansy, Smooth Skin & Cleanse Pores, Create-Your-Own Face Mask, Fun Skin Care Treatment, For All Skin Types, 6 Count
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: These Freeman Marble Peel-Off Masks are dual sided so you can mix the mask your self! Your face is the canvas and you are the artist!
French Pink Clay and Blue Tansy help cleanse pores and smooth skin for a glowy, healthy-looking complexion
Key Mask Benefits: cleanses and smooths
French Pink Clay helps detoxify and remove dead skin cells
Blue Tansy helps calm irritation and soothes dry skin
body.description: The Freeman Dual Marble Peel-Off Facial Mask Bundle helps you achieve beautiful skin while being creative. Your face is the canvas and you are the artist! Design your own peel-off mask by mixing these two soft pastel colored masks for a unique marble effect. French Pink Clay and Blue Tansy help cleanse pores and smooth skin for a glowy complexion. This Freeman Mask Bundle is the perfect gift for the girls and women in your life! Since 1976, Freeman has created feel-good formulas that seriously work (without losing all the fun!). We believe skincare belongs to everyone and strive to democratize beauty with affordable products. In our minds, clear skin = a clear conscious. Our top priority is ensuring our products are efficacious and full of good-for-you ingredients. Our new formulas are always dermatologist tested, free of parabens, sulfates, phthalates and mineral oil. We love our furry friends, too, and are proudly cruelty-free and never test on animals. From breakouts and blemishes to sensitive and dull complexions, we’re here to educate you on how to take care of your unique skin. We believe skincare is more than a routine... It’s about feeling good from the inside out!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ABOUT FREEMAN BEAUTY For over 40 years, Freeman Beauty has been on a mission to make nature inspired, fun, high-performing specialty beauty products accessible to the younger beauty-involved customer. With a portfolio of six beloved brands, we offer a wide range of facial masks, dry shampoo, specialty bath & body, and foot care products that provide a spa-like experience in the comfort of your own home. Freeman Beauty was launched in 1976 with a vision to provide nature inspired hair care, facial masks, and bath & body essentials. Since then, Freeman Beauty has become one of the leader and recognized expert in facial masks with a variety of innovative, on-trend products! Our brand portfolio includes Freeman Feeling Beautiful facial masks, Freeman Beauty Infusion serum-infused facial masks, Freeman Feeling Legendary facial masks for men, Freeman Bare Foot pampering foot care products, Psssst! the TRUE Original Dry Shampoo, and c.Booth bath & body care products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2022
Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't show up as marble on your face
reviews.reviewText: The colors mix together and it just ends up looking blue. The mask itself is ok though. I do notice my pores are smaller, but only for a few hours after using.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY!
reviews.reviewText: Horrible product! Dried like rubber cement and had to pry and scrub it off, not peel it off. It irritated everyone’s skin at the party and had to give them all Benadryl: (

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It hurts to remove but it’s awesome!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this with my sister in law at the dollar store and wasn’t expecting anything… I decided to try it tonight as I’m breaking out and super oily from PMS. It is really sticky when you put it on. I left it on longer than it says so it was good and dry. Peeling it off was PAINFUL, but OMG my skin looks and feels SO CLEAN and SO SOFT! I was not expecting that at all!DEFINITELY a big bang for a small buck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not the easiest to use
reviews.reviewText: This is easy to put on if applied quickly. Not very easily removed at all! My nine year old and my sixteen year old both had difficulties even after the mask was completely dried.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So I decided to get one and just NO! It’s in a bag so you can’t get a lot of the product and it DOESNT come off I had a big work meetingAnd decided to use one and I wash my face like 7 times and showerd with facial cleanser so for me it’s a BIG NO

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Was really sticky and seemed to fast dry coming out wouldn't spread at all and there was practically no product in the pink side. Very hard to get out of package to squeeze out!
